t: Amazon.com: Handful Of Rain: CDs & Vinyl
s: Jon couldn't have made a better choice. Also, the power house Zach Stevens was back to lead the charge on vocals, which sounds as great as ever. This album is a great mix of hard rock, bluesy power ballads and orchestra/ opera influenced songs- the signature of all Savatage albums.
